title: ğŸ“ Slack Helper
description: Use the 'ğŸ“ Summarize this thread' button in Slack threads to automatically extract messages and generate summaries in Gemini.

prompt.title: ğŸ“ Custom AI Prompt
prompt.hint: â€» Add {MESSAGES} to your AI prompt, and the system will automatically replace it with the Slack message content to be summarized.
prompt.placeholder: Enter your custom AI prompt, or leave blank to use default settings...
prompt.defaultSystemPrompt:
Please help me summarize the following Slack thread content (provide in Markdown format):

**Note: The following content uses Markdown format, including clickable links and user mentions**

{MESSAGES}

Please provide:
1. **Main discussion topics**
  - If there are different topics, please list them separately and indicate related messages.
2. **Key decisions or conclusions**
  - If there are different decisions, please list them separately and indicate related messages.
3. **Items requiring follow-up actions**
  - If there are different items requiring follow-up actions, please list them separately and indicate responsible persons.
4. **Other important matters**
  - If there are other important matters, please list them separately and indicate related messages.

*Please preserve Markdown format in your response, especially links and user mentions*
prompt.contentTruncated: ... (content truncated, see edit area for full content)
prompt.clearCustomSuccess: âœ… Custom prompt cleared, will use default

scroll.title: âš™ï¸ Thread Message Reading Settings
scroll.hint: Adjust these parameters to optimize message collection speed and accuracy. It's recommended to use default values first, then adjust if needed.
scroll.scrollDelayDesc: Controls the wait time for standard scrolling
scroll.minScrollAmountDesc: Ensures minimum distance for each scroll
scroll.maxScrollAttemptsDesc: Safety mechanism to prevent infinite scrolling
scroll.noMaxNewMessagesCountDesc: Stop scrolling after this many consecutive attempts with no new messages
scroll.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset scroll settings to default values?

sync.title: ğŸ”„ Gemini Model Sync
sync.hint: Manually manage Gemini model synchronization. Use manual sync to get the latest available model list.
sync.manualSyncModeDesc: Extension won't auto-sync models, manual trigger required to get latest model list
sync.syncProcessDesc: Sync will open new Gemini window to detect available models, then auto-close
sync.syncCompletedMessage: âœ… Model sync successful! Updating local model list...

llm.hint: Configure LLM API providers to enable message enhancement features (rephrase, improve, fix grammar, etc.).
llm.selectProviderDesc: Choose the LLM API provider you want to use
llm.openaiApiKeyDesc: Enter your OpenAI API Key (will be securely stored locally)
llm.openaiModelDesc: Select the OpenAI model to use
llm.compatibleBaseUrlDesc: Enter your API server base URL
llm.compatibleModelDesc: Enter the model name to use
llm.userModelsHint: Manage your list of supported models. These models will be available for selection in message enhancement features.
llm.addModelDesc: Enter the model name to support, supports OpenAI and other compatible API models
llm.defaultModelSelectDesc: Select the default model for message enhancement features
llm.confirmRemoveModel: Are you sure you want to remove this model?
llm.setGlobalDefaultFailed: Failed to set global default model
llm.selectProviderFirst: Please select an LLM provider first
llm.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
llm.invalidHeadersFormat: Invalid custom headers format, please use valid JSON
llm.invalidParamsFormat: Invalid custom parameters format, please use valid JSON

messageHelper.customPromptPlaceholder: Modify with a prompt... (Ctrl+Enter to apply)
messageHelper.pleaseTypeMessage: Please type a message first before applying custom prompt.
messageHelper.pleaseTypeMessageBeforeRefining: Please type a message first before refining it.
messageHelper.refining: Refining your message for better quality and clarity...

usage.title: Usage Instructions:
usage.step1: Open any thread in Slack web version
usage.step2: Click the 'ğŸ“ Summarize this thread' button that appears
usage.step3: Select appropriate Gemini model in preview page
usage.step4: Confirm summary, wait for Gemini to auto-open and paste message
usage.step5: View the summary results generated by Gemini
usage.step6: ğŸ’¡ Manage Gemini model sync in 'ğŸ”„ Model Sync' tab

scrollCollector.maxScrollAttempts: Increase max scroll attempts to support long threads

scrollCollector.autoScrollCollect: Auto-scroll and collect complete thread messages
